definition: Suzhou Creek (river in Shanghai)
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Suchow creek. Traffic jam. During the last days of the Kuomintang.
sentences.chinese: 國民黨政府執政的最後幾天中，蘇州河航道擁堵。

sentences.english: Since its birth, Shanghai has closely been tied with the Suzhou Creek.
sentences.chinese: 上海自出生之日起，就與蘇州河息息相連。

sentences.english: To the north of the Hotel is Suzhou River and to the east is the famous yacht pier pf Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 北面俯瞰蘇州河，東邊是上海灘著名的遊艇碼頭。

sentences.english: The municipal government has decided to conduct a comprehensive treatment to the environmental problems along the Suzhou River.
sentences.chinese: 市政府決定對蘇州河沿岸的環境問題進行綜合治理。

sentences.english: For instance, do you still remember the limpid in Suzhou Creek?
sentences.chinese: 例如，你還記得在蘇州河清澈？
